text: A man must love a thing very much if he not only practices it without any hope of fame and money, but even... without any hope of doing it well.
author: Oliver Herford

text: A moderate addiction to money may not always be hurtful but when taken in excess it is nearly always bad for the health.
author: Clarence Day

text: Here's how I think of my money - as soldiers - I send them out to war everyday. I want them to take prisoners and come home, so there's more of them.
author: Kevin O'Leary

text: I know why most people never get rich. They put the money ahead of the job. If you just think of the job, the money will automatically follow. This never fails.
author: Hedy Lamarr

text: Well, the chairman of Federal Reserve just made his move to rescue Barack Obama. We're gonna have QE3. We're gonna print some more money.
author: Rush Limbaugh
